entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Roberval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roberval Airport 12:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear

Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
